responsibilities: At Amabla IT, I develop and optimize microfinance software using Php, Laravel, SQL, focusing on query optimization, financial reporting, and loan processing.

I have contributed to building financial reporting modules, such as Portfolio at Risk (PAR) report, branch-wise data aggregation,Collection sheet report, periodical progress report, and loan due calculations. Additionally, I have worked on REST API integration, ensuring smooth communication between microfinance systems and external platforms.
My role also involves optimizing large-scale database queries, significantly improving system performance and reducing execution time for financial reports.
My experience includes refactoring PHP codebases, making them more efficient and maintainable for an improved user experience.
At Global Medical Engineering (Bd) Ltd., I designed and developed a Digital Management System (DMS) from scratch, handling both database planning and software implementation.
I was responsible for architecting the database, ensuring scalability and efficiency, and developing the system with a focus on automation, data management, and workflow optimization.
My work involved full-cycle development, from requirement analysis and system design to coding, testing, ensuring a seamless and efficient digital management solution.
Mostly, I am responsible for developed new feature and integrated existing ecommerce platform
I used mainly PHP, laravel 8 for backend development, javascript, jquery for front end development also for database we use sql, MYSQL.
Managed database design and performance using MySQL, optimizing queries and ensuring data integrity.
